text: Hello, anyone else experiencing issues when trying to save anything in the design manager this morning? I am editing a page template and it attempts to save for a minute or two before failing
Tried out 3 browsers (Brave, Safari, FireFox on macOS) to make sure it wasnt a browser issue
make sure you dont have an error.  i miss  that sometimes
Hey <@UE2UDHRJ6>, mind DM-ing me a link to where you're seeing this?

Can I ask a general question about Choice field in module, when I update the value of a choice, when doesn’t it update globally to all webpages using that field, why do I have to go into each webpage then into the module and make the update, seems like the JSON does not get updated with new values, so is there anything like a bulk push that can update the JSON for all pages using that module?
it’s a precaution so you don’t break every page on your site on accident. Normally you don’t need to change the actual value just the labels
